DOC.brief_summary: Determine the in-vivo mechanism of action of INF-B-1b as it's mechanisms of action are not completely understood. We propose that high dose exogenous recombinant IFN-B-1b induces tolerizing effect on DC-dependent T-cell differentiation in patients with MS by inducing the expression of SOCS3 in DCs.
DOC.brief_title: Characterization of Interferon Beta -1b-Induced Tolerizing Effect in Dendritic Cells
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis of MS Age 1860 years, inclusive Expanded disability status of 06.5 Give written informed consent prior to any testing under this protocol
